sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { BriefcaseIcon, UserGroupIcon, CalendarIcon, ChartBarIcon, CogIcon, PlusIcon, EyeIcon, PencilIcon, CheckCircleIcon, XCircleIcon, BellIcon, MagnifyingGlassIcon, ChevronDownIcon, ChevronUpIcon, UserIcon, ClockIcon, PhoneIcon, VideoCameraIcon, MapPinIcon, DocumentTextIcon, StarIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const RecruiterUserDashboard = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('dashboard'); const [sidebarOpen, setSidebarOpen] = useState(true); const navigate = useNavigate(); // Mock data for demonstration const recruiterName = "Sarah Johnson"; const dashboardStats = { myOpenings: 8, newApplications: 23, upcomingInterviews: 5, totalCandidates: 89 }; const pipelineData = { applied: 45, screened: 28, interviewed: 12, offer: 4 }; const recentActivity = [ { id: 1, action: 'New application for "Frontend Developer" job', time: '30 minutes ago', type: 'application' }, { id: 2, action: 'Interview with John Smith completed', time: '2 hours ago', type: 'interview' }, { id: 3, action: 'Note added to Mike Johnson\'s profile', time: '4 hours ago', type: 'note' }, { id: 4, action: 'Interview scheduled for Lisa Chen', time: '1 day ago', type: 'interview' } ]; const myJobPostings = [ { id: 1, title: 'Frontend Developer', department: 'Engineering', location: 'Bangalore', status: 'Open', applications: 15, datePosted: '2024-01-15' }, { id: 2, title: 'UX Designer', department: 'Design', location: 'Mumbai', status: 'Open', applications: 8, datePosted: '2024-01-14' }, { id: 3, title: 'Product Manager', department: 'Product', location: 'Delhi', status: 'Closed', applications: 12, datePosted: '2024-01-10' }, { id: 4, title: 'QA Engineer', department: 'Engineering', location: 'Pune', status: 'Open', applications: 6, datePosted: '2024-01-12' } ]; const myApplications = [ { id: 1, name: 'John Smith', job: 'Frontend Developer', date: '2024-01-15', status: 'New', hasResume: true }, { id: 2, name: 'Lisa Chen', job: 'UX Designer', date: '2024-01-14', status: 'Shortlisted', hasResume: true }, { id: 3, name: 'Mike Johnson', job: 'Product Manager', date: '2024-01-13', status: 'Reviewed', hasResume: true }, { id: 4, name: 'Sarah Wilson', job: 'QA Engineer', date: '2024-01-12', status: 'Rejected', hasResume: true } ]; const myInterviews = [ { id: 1, candidate: 'Lisa Chen', job: 'UX Designer', interviewer: 'Me', date: '2024-01-20', time: '10:00 AM', type: 'Video', status: 'Scheduled' }, { id: 2, candidate: 'John Smith', job: 'Frontend Developer', interviewer: 'Me + Tech Lead', date: '2024-01-21', time: '2:00 PM', type: 'On-site', status: 'Scheduled' }, { id: 3, candidate: 'Mike Johnson', job: 'Product Manager', interviewer: 'Me', date: '2024-01-19', time: '11:00 AM', type: 'Phone', status: 'Completed' } ]; const renderDashboard = () => (
{/* Welcome Message */}

Welcome back, {recruiterName}!

Here's what's happening with your recruitment activities today.

{/* Stats Cards */}

My Openings

{dashboardStats.myOpenings}

New Applications

{dashboardStats.newApplications}

Upcoming Interviews

{dashboardStats.upcomingInterviews}

Total Candidates

{dashboardStats.totalCandidates}

{/* Pipeline Snapshot */}

My Pipeline Snapshot

{pipelineData.applied}
Applied
{pipelineData.screened}
Screened
{pipelineData.interviewed}
Interviewed
{pipelineData.offer}
Offer
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

{recentActivity.map((activity) => (
{activity.action}
{activity.time}
))}
); const renderJobPostings = () => (
{/* Header */}

My Job Postings

{/* Search and Filter */}
{/* Jobs Table */}
{myJobPostings.map((job) => ( ))}
Job Title Department Location Status Applications Date Posted Actions
{job.title}
{job.department}
{job.location}
 {job.status}
{job.applications}
{job.datePosted}
); const renderApplications = () => (
{/* Header */}

My Candidate Applications

{/* Search and Filter */}
{/* Applications Table */}
{myApplications.map((app) => ( ))}
Candidate Job Applied Date Status Resume Actions
{app.name}
{app.job}
{app.date}
 {app.status} {app.hasResume ? ( ) : ( No )}
); const renderInterviews = () => (
{/* Header */}

My Interview Schedule

{/* Calendar View Toggle */}
{/* Interviews Table */}
{myInterviews.map((interview) => ( ))}
Candidate Job Interviewer Date & Time Type Status Actions
{interview.candidate}
{interview.job}
{interview.interviewer}
{interview.date} at {interview.time}
 {interview.type} {interview.status}
{interview.type === 'Video' && ( )}
); const renderProfile = () => (

My Profile & Settings

{/* Profile Information */}

Profile Information
